<style>
  @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Open+Sans:wght@400;700&display=swap');

  body {
    font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    background-color: #fdfdff;
    background-image:
      linear-gradient(30deg, #f7f7fe 12%, transparent 12.5%, transparent 87%, #f7f7fe 87.5%, #f7f7fe),
      linear-gradient(150deg, #f7f7fe 12%, transparent 12.5%, transparent 87%, #f7f7fe 87.5%, #f7f7fe),
      linear-gradient(30deg, #f7f7fe 12%, transparent 12.5%, transparent 87%, #f7f7fe 87.5%, #f7f7fe),
      linear-gradient(150deg, #f7f7fe 12%, transparent 12.5%, transparent 87%, #f7f7fe 87.5%, #f7f7fe),
      linear-gradient(60deg, #f7f7fe77 25%, transparent 25.5%, transparent 75%, #f7f7fe77 75%, #f7f7fe77),
      linear-gradient(60deg, #f7f7fe77 25%, transparent 25.5%, transparent 75%, #f7f7fe77 75%, #f7f7fe77);
    background-size: 50px 88px;
    background-position: 0 0, 0 0, 25px 44px, 25px 44px, 0 0, 25px 44px;
  }

  /* Style the Quarto title block instead of inserting a raw <header> */
  .quarto-title-block.default {
    background-color: #00274D;
    color: #ffffff;
    text-align: center;
    padding: 30px 20px;
    border-bottom: 4px solid #FFA500;
    margin-bottom: 0;
  }
  .quarto-title-block.default .title {
    font-size: 2.4em;
    color: #ffffff;
    margin-bottom: 0.25em;
  }
  .quarto-title-block.default .subtitle {
    font-size: 1.4em;
    font-weight: 300;
    color: #ffffff;
  }

  .container {
    max-width: 1200px;
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding: 20px;
  }

  .section {
    margin: 20px 0;
    padding: 20px;
    background-color: #ffffff;
    border-radius: 8px;
    box-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08);
  }

  .tool-cards {
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    gap: 20px;
    margin-top: 20px;
  }

  .tool-card {
    display: flex;
    align-items: flex-start;
    background-color: #ffffff;
    border-left: 5px solid #FFA500;
    border-radius: 8px;
    padding: 15px 20px;
    box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.06);
    transition: transform 0.2s ease;
  }
  .tool-card:hover {
    transform: translateY(-2px);
  }

  .tool-icon {
    font-size: 2rem;
    margin-right: 15px;
  }

.tool-card {
  display: flex;
  align-items: flex-start;
  position: relative; /* Add this */
  background-color: #ffffff;
  border-left: 5px solid #FFA500;
  border-radius: 8px;
  padding: 15px 20px 20px 20px; /* Add extra bottom padding to make room for button */
  box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.06);
  transition: transform 0.2s ease;
}

.tool-content {
  flex: 1;
  position: relative; /* Needed for absolute positioning inside */
  padding-bottom: 0px;
}


  .tool-content h3 {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: 1.2rem;
    color: #00274D;
  }

  .tool-content p {
    margin: 5px 0 0;
    font-size: 0.95rem;
    color: #333;
  }

.cta {
  left: 0;
  padding: 6px 12px;
  margin: 5px 5px;
  background-color: #FFA500;
  color: #ffffff;
  border-radius: 5px;
  float: right;
  text-decoration: none;
  font-weight: bold;
}

.cta:hover {
  background-color: #cc8400;
}

  footer {
    background-color: #00274D;
    color: #ffffff;
    text-align: center;
    padding: 15px 0;
    margin-top: 40px;
  }

  a {
    color: #FFA500;
    text-decoration: none;
    font-weight: bold;
  }
  a:hover {
    text-decoration: underline;
  }
</style>

::: {.container}
